Package padsof

Class Commentary

  • java.lang.Object
    • padsof.Commentary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rating, Textual

    public abstract class Commentary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Alejandro Santorum y David Cabornero This class creates and allows us to work with commentaries about other commentaries or offers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void commentCommentary​(Commentary comment)
      This function allows us to comment our commentary.
      RegisteredUser getCommentator​()
      This getter gives the registered user who comments the commentary
      java.util.ArrayList<Commentary> getComments​()
      This getter gives us the array of commentaries which comments this commentary.
      java.util.GregorianCalendar getDate​()
      This getter gives the date when the commentary was created
      java.lang.String toString​()
      This toString gives the information about the nick of the commentator and the date and time when the commentary was created.
